column4: TA6.33;Renewable Energy;+;The restoration of terrestrial ecosystems can lead to increased carbon sequestration
column5: which can positively impact the development and use of renewable energy sources by reducing greenhouse gas emissions and mitigating climate change. This synergy can enhance the effectiveness of renewable energy technologies.

column3: TA6.45;Energy Efficiency - Buildings;+;Restoring agricultural ecosystems can improve soil health
column6: which can lead to more efficient use of energy in buildings through the adoption of sustainable agricultural practices and the use of renewable energy sources.

column2: TA6.40;Renewable Energy - Hydrogen Production;-;The restoration of forests can lead to increased competition for land use
column3: potentially limiting the availability of land for hydrogen production facilities
column4: which could negatively impact the development of renewable energy sources.

column3: TA6.42;Renewable Energy - Ocean/Offshore;+;Restoring marine ecosystems can improve the health and resilience of coastal ecosystems
column4: which can positively impact the development and use of offshore renewable energy technologies
column5: such as wind and tidal power.

column3: TA6.28;Renewable Energy;+;Protecting and conserving biodiversity can help maintain ecosystem services
column4: which are essential for the development and use of renewable energy sources
column5: such as wind and solar power
column6: by ensuring the long-term health and resilience of ecosystems.

column2: TA6.28;Energy Efficiency;-;The protection and conservation of fisheries can lead to increased costs and regulations for the fishing industry
column3: which could negatively impact energy efficiency efforts in the sector
column4: such as the adoption of more efficient fishing gear and practices.
TA6.38;Energy Efficiency - Buildings;+;Urban nature conservation can help reduce the urban heat island effect
column6: and increase energy efficiency in buildings through the use of green roofs

column2: TA6.39;Renewable Energy - Hydrogen Production;+;Restoring river ecosystems can improve water quality
column5: which can positively impact the development and use of hydrogen production facilities
column6: such as those using river water as a source of hydrogen.
